original_text: How God anointed Jesus of Nazareth with the Holy Ghost and with power: who went about doing good, and healing all that were oppressed of the devil; for God was with him.
korean_text: 하나님이 나사렛 예수에게 성령과 능력을 기름 붓듯 하셨으매 그가 두루 다니시며 선한 일을 행하시고 마귀에게 눌린 모든 사람을 고치셨으니 이는 하나님이 함께 하셨음이라

sentences.original_text: How God anointed Jesus of Nazareth
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 나사렛 예수에게 기름을 부으신 방법

sentences.original_text: with the Holy Ghost and with power
and healing all that were oppressed of the devil
